Posts.Content: pattid3 wrote: I had my biopsy on july 3rd and on july 17, (my 26th wedding anniversary) i had my results.  The lump in my right breast is about 2 cm and according to my surgeon is invassive cancer.  In my left breast i have stage 0 precancer calcifications.  Sorry but i was trying so hard to listen but just kept crying so all the information was hard to absorb all to once.  Anyway I am scheduled for a bilateral masectomy on august 1.  I will undergo breast reconstruction after my treatment.  I dont know if i am doing the right things and how do tell my son.  The last thing I want is for him to worry but he has to know.  I sound like a basket case and I guess right now I am.  I am so scared.  My mom died of breast cancer.  Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: scared and confused pattid3 pattid3
